rComments: Posts notes online so you can follow him more easily in lecture. if you've read his notes beforehand you will find his lectures rather boring.Stellar evolution is not an easy subject to tackle so go to his office hours as often as you can. The homework is graded harshly but the curve is rather gentle.

One of the best professors at UCSC. The lectures were fully self contained and presented in a logically pure, yet engaging fashion. He showed enthusiasm, eagerness to help, and answered every question in full and with respect towards the students asking it. The exams were difficult, but the grades were fairly curved. Overall unbeatable experience!
